entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stdin is redirected to stdout on Linux #86851
  • [API Proposal]: Add support for AVX-512 VNNI hardware instructions #86849
  • RSACertificateExtensions.GetRSAPublicKey Error #86845

Closed

  • [browser][MT] Memory growth on worker could cause failure #86642
    8.0.0
  • Issues using Blazor Multithreading within iframes #86696
    Future
  • System.IO.Packaging NuGet package lists System.IO.FileSystem.Primitives as a dependency, even for net472 where the later is part of the framework #31298
    6.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty` for collection #86830
  • could not able to install .net in rhel9 manually using "dotnet-sdk-6.0-6.0.116-2.el9.x86_64.rpm" file #86831

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't emit nor generate the manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource #86850
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [libs] Fix poll events conversion #86843
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] implement Interlocked.ReadMemoryBarrier intrinsic #86842
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [browser][mt] Update memory views after growth, refactor string processing, fix SharedArrayBuffer detection #86664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Use Span to fill List<T> in more ToList scenarios #86796
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2189709 #86818
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement stream-based ZipFile ExtractToDirectory and CreateFromDirectory method overloads #85491
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: make global morph its own phase, morph blocks in RPO #86822
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Share UTF8 converters between coreclr and mono #85558
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    community-contribution, needs-area-label, os-haiku
  • StringBuilder: use Span.Fill in Append repeating char #86287
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Devirtualization with multiple guesses: JIT #86809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# 12 primary constructors + ObsoleteAttribute #68349
  • WatchHotReloadService.EndSession not reset DebuggingSessionID properly #68348

PullRequests

Created

  • Move tests of `IDE0060` to `VerifyCS` #68350

Updated

  • Initialize 'Flags' and 'DeclarationModifiers' in constructor of SourceMemberMethodSymbol #68347
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Design Debt, untriaged
  • Fix Color Color const field initialization accessing the Color type #68283
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Cleanup refactorings around method-flags and body info. #68210
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.content:

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #48477

  • Perf improvement: json, json, plainTextWithFilter #48475
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextSansFilter #48474
  • Perf improvement: mvc, mvc, plaintext #48473

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #47740

PullRequests

Updated

    area-mvc

    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • adding net7.0 tfm to project with handlers crashes #15314
  • ResourceDictionary get item operator weird behaviour CRITICAL #15312
  • Scroll does not work on Mac (Mac Catalyst) #15310

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main #15313

Merged

    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.RecyclerView from 1.3.0.1 to 1.3.0.2 #15272
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.Navigation.Common from 2.5.3.2 to 2.5.3.3 #15260
